resources.string: Play create and share quizzes easily
Sie haben derzeit kein Fragebogenprojekt. Sie kÃ¶nnen trotzdem eine erstellen!
Sie haben keine Fragebogendatei im Speicher Ihres Mobiltelefons. Sie kÃ¶nnen eine erstellen oder eine \'*.qcm\'-Datei zu Ihrem Speicher hinzufÃ¼gen und aktualisieren.
Sie kÃ¶nnen Ihren Speicher nicht durchsuchen, um nach \'*.qcm\'-Dateien zu suchen. Akzeptieren Sie Berechtigungen, damit &appname; alle auflisten kann. wenn es welche gibt.
Create, play, and share MCQ/quizzes with the &appname; app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.devup.qcm.maker&hl=en

Can not make a temporary shareable copy on your disk. You must accept permission to continue
The submitted web link is not valid.
Total number of questions and answers contained in this questionnaire.

When random mode is active, this property is used to define the number of randomly proposed questions per session / test.\n\nIt must be less than or equal to the total number of questions. By default, it is equal to the total number of questions.
Defined in which language are the questions and answers of this questionnaire.

When the smart input is activated (Recommended *), this allows the execution of the test; to present the user with intelligent answer selectors: multiple-answer questions will have checkBoxes, single-response questions will have radioButtons and for open-ended questions whose answer is composed by a single word, the user will have at his disposal a panel of letters from the alphabet that will allow him to easily grasp the answer to the question.\n\nIf this configuration is not active, all the answers will be in the form of a checkbox and for open answers the user will have to enter the answer directly from the Android keyboard.
The version code is a descriptive number that defines the version of the content of your questionnaire.

* .qcm files are generated from a build tool based on the Q Maker algorithm; each improvement of this algorithm gives birth to a new version of the \"buildTools\". These improvements can be of many kinds; from optimization to adding some new properties to the *.qcm file structure.\n\nEach Q-maker compatible application must have a BuildTools version greater than or equal to the BuildTools version of the *.qcm file in order to correctly read or edit it.
Defined if the questions-answers of this questionnaire will be proposed randomly or not. This property is accompanied by a maximum number of questions per session.
Defines the duration of the questionnaire. How much time will pass before the questionnaire automatically ends (even if the user has not completed it).
Defines the time allotted for each question; how long will it take before the next question will be automatically displayed.(even without the user providing an answer).

Defines whether or not a correction can be proposed to the user at the end of the test.\n\nIf the chosen mode is \'partial correction\' only the answer proposals entered by the user will be marked as true or false while correcting.
Time per question in challenge mode
Do you want to crop the image?

Be careful, a project with same name already exists. If you choose to continue this one will be overwritten and replaced.
Set a destination title for your copy.

Assign a new ID to your copy.
Learn more?

Each questionnaire has an unique identifier (ID) in the world.

This unique ID identifies each generated questionnaire file.

Thus, if two questionnaires have the same Q-ID, the system will consider them as two versions of the same questionnaire.

In this case, the Q-Maker algorithm will then cross-compare the last modified date and version code to determine if it is an update; from the current version or an earlier version.
An editable has been created for this questionnaire and is now available in your \'CREATION\' space. You can access it right now to start editing.
Give a name to the editable to create in your space \'CREATION\'.
Unexpected error during the copy of the questionnaire file \'%s\', the file can not be copied.
A copy has been created for this quiz file and is now available in your \'QUESTIONNAIRES\' space. You can access it now.
A copy of the current questionnaire file will be made and stored at the location:\n%s
Sorry, the author of this questionnaire has not defined a signature that will have allowed to recognize or link to his work.
Is the &appname; app useful for you? Please, encourage us and support this totally free and no ads initiative by rating app 5 stars on PlayStore.ðŸ˜Š
Continue to follow us, give your opinion and stay informed of all the news by liking and subscribing to our Facebook Page.
Become a member of our Facebook community express yourself, share and receive qcm files and even tips about &appname; app.
You can not find your qcm file? Start a global scan ...
Search for all qcm files on your disk.\nScan in progress, it may take a few minutes ...
Ready? This first game will allows you to have a preview of a quiz when Reading in Â«%1$sÂ».
Consult details information to find out more about this questionnaire.
A ride to the Quiz editor?
Discover your \'creation\' space and edit your first questionnaire...
&appname; is a \'quiz file\' reader and editor.\n\nIn order to detect and list quiz files on your mobile device, you must grant the storage read permission to the application.

In addition to being a reader for file with extension \'qcm\', &appname; also allows to edit \'quiz file\'.\n\nIn this tab, you will find all your creations, all your edited questionnaires ; you will be able to view, modify and share them.
Suppressing questions and answers. Click to undo.
This is your creation space.\nIn this tab you will find a list of all your creations; you can view, edit and share them with your friends.
Write us, share with us your point of view and your expectations about &appname;. Together we will make the \'qcm\' file extension Reader/Editor; &appname; an application to your taste.
What do you think about &appname; application, let us know, write us an email. We will be happy to read you... ðŸ™‚
Please, let us known.\nDo you appreciate the use and features offered by the &appname; application?
The *.qcm file interpreter your are using seems old. The questionnaire file may not be read correctly; some properties and features might be missing.\n\nUpdate your application to enjoy new features
The *.qcm file interpreter your are using is obsolete. Some properties and features are no longer compatible.\n\nUpdate your application to enjoy new features
Do not show again for this questionnaire
What would you like to see available in the app?
Please, email us. Most of the features currently available are the result of suggestions from users like you.\nWe will be happy to read you ðŸ™‚

Like a game against the clock, the questions are proposed to you one after another. You must respond in time.

If time allocated to the question is exceeded or if you choose a response proposal as an answer, the app show you if it is true or false, show correction(depending on whether the questionnaire configuration allows it or not.) and automatically goes to the next question. More information click here!

Defines if when exported to shareable *.qcm file, this quiz may or may not be run in challenge mode or in exam mode.

Exam & Challenge
Exam mode has priority over challenge mode

Challenge & Exam
Challenge mode has priority over exam mode

When a play mode has priority, it means that it will be the default mode offered to the user if the user has not explicitly specified a play mode.

In this page, you will find the description and configuration information of your questionnaire file.\n\nEven more, you can choose the play mode between Challenge and Exam before pressing PLAY to begin.
Change the play mode; what do you think?
By clicking here, you can change the play mode of this quiz by choosing between Exam mode (default) and Challenge mode (Game against the clock)
You are not currently connected to internet. The download will start automatically once the internet connection will be available.
The download will start when you will be connected to the internet
When you consult a quiz file from the Web, you can download it on your mobile or append a desktop shortcut by clicking here.
When consulting a quiz file provided by another application, you can make a copy or to create a new editable quiz project by clicking here.
All the questions and answers recorded in this questionnaire will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
A shortcut for the quiz \'%1$s\' will be created on your desktop.
An unexpected error occurred while creating a shortcut for the quiz \'%1$s\'

&appname; is free with no ads and should remain so. Your 5 stars on PlayStore are our only real support and motivation.\n\nEach 5 stars is a BoOom of joy that invites us to continuous perseverance in improvement and innovation.
You must activate your internet connection before performing this action.
How can we better satisfy you?
How can we improve the app to match as much as possible your need and get 5 stars from you?\n\nApp &appname; is free and each idea is a treasure which help us on perpetual improvement.
When you have finished defining your Qmaker author profile information, click here to save.

Here you can fill in your author profile information that will be used to sign your qcm shareable files.\n\nIf your author profile is not filled in, your qcm files will be marked by {anonymous author}.

Edit your Q-maker author profile so that each of your works will be automatically signed with your information. Thus, during the reading you will be mentioned as author of this questionnaire. It\'s simple and take few minutes.\nClick to start!

You have not edited your author profile yet.

The qcm shareable files that you create will have the mention of {anonymous author} and you will not be linked to your work.

You can still continue to share or edit your author profile to sign your creation.

You have not edited your author profile yet.

The qcm shareable files that you create will have the mention of {anonymous author} and you will not be linked to your work.

You can still continue the export or edit your author profile to sign your creation.
Your results have been successfully sent.
Do you have completed your changes?
When you have finished your changes, you can return to your questionnaires and creations space by clicking here.

Great, your author profile is ready. The sharable *.qcm files that you will create will now have the authoring mention: {created by %1$s}.\n\nIf you have already created questionnaire files (*.qcm) that you want to update with your new signature; export them again as *.qcm file. The signature will be done automatically.
Click on a profile to find out more
This questionnaire has the collection feature.\n\nYour results will be sent to the author of this questionnaire.
When you will be ready, please, do not hesitate to encourage and support the &appname; project and initiative by rating the app on the PlayStore. ðŸ™‚
Improvements, ideas, wishes or errors-bugs to report? Do not hesitate to write to us, it will cloud our day. We will be happy to read you and give you an answer. ðŸ˜‰
Come discover the future improvements, share and exchange with us and other users. We are waiting for you in the &appname; community with a big smile. ðŸ˜Š

This is the preview and configuration page of your quiz project.

You will be able to fill here information about description and configurations of your questionnaire.

Ready for the guided visit?
By clicking here, you will be able to add a picture cover to your questionnaire.
Export your creations as a *.qcm file!
Once you have edited your questionnaire and it is ready, you can export it as a shareable *.qcm file by clicking here.

Here you will find the options that will allow you not only to share your questionnaire as a *.qcm file, but also to import Q & A(questions and answers) both from a simple text file created from a computer and from an existing *.qcm file.
When you will have edited your first questions and answers, you could click here to test and play your creation.
You can test and play your creation by clicking here.
Test in challenge mode or in exam mode?
At any time, before launching the test, you can change the game mode and choose between challenge and exam by clicking here.
Let\'s go around, slide the screen up and down to discover your possibilities and what can be configured. Here, everything is clickable don\'t hesitate.
When you\'re ready, click on the "EDIT" button to create your first question-and-answers.
When you\'re ready, click on the "EDIT" button to edit your questions-and-answers.
No description defined for this questionnaire.
The modification of this questionnaire is locked by password.

The selected quiz can not be read because some features required by this quiz are not available on the current app release installed on your device.\n\nPlease, update your application for a better experience.

The quiz you have selected requires features that are not available in the current installed app release. The quiz may be interpreted but some components may not work properly or can be absent.\n\nPlease, update your app for a better experience.
As a game against the clock, you must answer one question after another.
Your device is able to play sounds and audios contained in *.qcm files.
The selected quiz contains audios that can not be played on your device because the Android version you are using is too old.\n\nUpdate your system to Android-5 or higher for a better experience.
Enter the lock password that other users will need to enter before they can edit your creation.

Defines whether the edition of your creation; once exported as portable and shareable file with extension * .qcm ; will be password protected so that only those who know this password will be allowed to edit your creation.\n\nIndeed, you can export your creations as a portable and sharable file with extension *.qcm; however, any other user will be able to modify it unless it is locked in edition with a password.
The requested play mode is not supported.
An error occurred while loading the page from the internet.\nPlease check your internet connection and try again.
%1$s occurrences of this quiz were detected with different locations on storage disk.
Page of similar files found on your disk
When several occurrences or different versions of the same quiz exist on your disk, this page allows you to list them all and to have access to them.\n\nAre you ready for the guided tour ?
The most recent questionnaire file is the one in the first position in the list.
For each version of this questionnaire file found ; you can start to play it by clicking here !
Before you start playing your quiz, you can always choose your preferred play mode between exam or challenge !
Click here to access more options regarding your questionnaire file (*.qcm).
Found this file on your disk !
Here, you will see where this questionnaire file is located on your disk. Click for more details !

The presentation is finished.
Here, %1$s occurrences of the same quiz were found. Feel free to explore and discover the possibilities offered by this page.

Also, you can get more information about similar files by clicking here.
Two (2) questionnaire files (*.qcm) are said to be similar if they have the same signature identifier (ID)

This app module should be able to display view to handle question\'s type = "%1$s"

The selected quiz may not be properly interpreted because some features required by this quiz are not available on the current app release installed on your device.

By continuing, the resulting quiz data could be corrupted.

Please, update your app for a better experience.

Discover QuizMaker professional edition which comes with more configuration options and up to five (5) additional questions types:

1-Enumeration
2-Fill in the blanks
3-Put in order
4-Match columns
5-Open ended question with multiple answers
When you will be ready ; feel free to click here to discover or to get more information about QuizMaker professional edition. ðŸ™‚

The content and signature of the application is not in conformity.

The APK you may have installed may not be an original version of this software.

This can happen when you install an "APK" from a non-certified source or when the installable APK has been modified from reverse engineering or counterfeit software.

In order to protect you and ensure you have a good and safe experience, &appname; will not be able to launch.

Please install the original version of this software from GooglePlay or directly from the original APK which you can download directly from QmakerTech servers.
A demo quiz was added automatically!
We have added a demo quiz to allow you to have a brief overview of app features. Thus, you will be able to play your 1st questionnaire.\nClick when you\'re ready to start!
You are about to end the guided tour; this can be very useful in order to allow you to quickly get to grips with the basic functionalities.\n\nAre you sure you want to leave the guided tour?
Before you start, choose the play mode you want to try first:\n1-Exam simulation\n2-Challenge mode or game against the clock with immediate correction.

For unknown reasons, &appname; cannot remember the edit lock password that you previously configured. This issue prevents automatic unlocking of your project edition.\n\nPlease enter again in the field below the edit password you have configured to unlock the editing.

Die hier konfigurierte Dauer wird auf alle Tests angewendet.

You see this icon because this quiz has been patched in order to keep the limitation concerning the number of answer proposals that can be shown when playing in challenge mode just like in old &appname; version. By clicking here, you will be able to remove this limitation.
At any time, you can manage compatibility configurations for older versions of the application (<2.6) by accessing the \'Compatibility management\' menu.

Aktivieren Sie den Patch, der die Anzahl der pro Ãœbung anzuzeigenden AntwortvorschlÃ¤ge begrenzt, um das gleiche Verhalten bei Ã¤lteren Versionen beim Spielen im Herausforderungsmodus beizubehalten: eine (1) maximale echte Antwort fÃ¼r vier (4) maximale AntwortvorschlÃ¤ge pro Ãœbung. Um mehr darÃ¼ber zu erfahren, klicken Sie hier

Seit den neuesten Versionen des Builders der *.qcm-Datei (4 und hÃ¶her) wurden viele Aktualisierungen und Ã„nderungen vorgenommen, um die EinschrÃ¤nkungen hinsichtlich der Anzahl der anzeigbaren VorschlÃ¤ge beim Spielen im Herausforderungsmodus zu beseitigen (maximal 4 mit a einzelne wahre Antwort).

Like a game against the clock, the questions are proposed to you one after another. You must respond in time.

If time allocated to the question is exceeded or if you choose a response proposal as an answer, the app show you if it is true or false, show correction(depending on whether the questionnaire configuration allows it or not.) and automatically goes to the next question.
We are going to show you some useful tips for getting started quickly. Ready for the guided tour?

This timer tells you the specific time remaining for this question. It is reset each time you finalize an exercise and go to the next question. You must respond in time. If the time is up, the application will automatically go to the next page.
In challenge mode, your score is immediately calculated each time you answer a question.
If the question requires manual submission or if you just want to move on to the next question, you can click here. The application will then show you the correction and go to the next page.
You can end the test at any time by clicking here. The app will then show you your score even if you have not gone through all of the test questions.
We will restart the test and the timer will restart to allow you to perform your first exercise and answer your first question and answer! Ready, are we going?

Whenever you answer a question; the application gives you the opportunity to pause by clicking here. You can for example take the opportunity to read the explanatory comment or simply to read again. Otherwise, the application will automatically go to the next question. Go ahead, click to pause!
You are at the last exercise!
When you have answered the last question, you can click on finish to end the test and thus obtain your overall score.

At any time during the test, you can click here to open the quick navigation menu which will allow you not only to have an overview of your test but also to quickly navigate from one question to another. Go ahead, try, click to find out!
That is it, the test is on pause!

Each time you answer a question in challenge mode, even if you do not pause the test, the application immediately displays the correction (depending on the quiz configuration) with a specific color code:

Bereit zur Entdeckung?

Der PrÃ¼fungsmodus hat die Form eines PrÃ¼fungssimulators. Der Spieler kann wÃ¤hrend des gesamten Tests frei von einer Frage zur nÃ¤chsten navigieren.
Die angezeigte Zeit gilt fÃ¼r die gesamte PrÃ¼fung und der Test endet automatisch, wenn diese Zeit aufgebraucht ist.

Die Punktzahl und die Korrektur des Fragebogens werden dem Benutzer erst nach Abschluss des Tests angezeigt.
Temps restant pour le tout le test!

Ce timer vous indique le temps restant pour tout le test. Vous devez gÃ©rer vous mÃªme votre temps pour chaque question. Si le temps est Ã©coulÃ©, le test se terminera automatiquement et l\'application affichera votre score.

Vous pouvez aussi effectuer cette action simplement en faissant glisser l\'Ã©cran Ã gauche ou Ã droite avec votre doigt.
Nous allons relancer le test et le chrono va se remettre en marche afin de vous permettre de poursuivre le test en rÃ©pondant aux question-rÃ©ponses!\n\nPrÃªt, on y va?

Hier erhalten Sie einen allgemeinen Ãœberblick Ã¼ber den Status Ihres Tests und kÃ¶nnen sogar schnell von einer Frage zur nÃ¤chsten navigieren.

DarÃ¼ber hinaus kÃ¶nnen Sie den Status jeder Frage anhand eines bestimmten Farbcodes allgemein anzeigen:

Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie sich die Testkorrektur nicht ansehen mÃ¶chten?
Am Ende jedes Tests kÃ¶nnen Sie, wenn die Konfiguration dies zulÃ¤sst, die Korrektur einsehen und sich anhand des Farbcodes einen Ãœberblick Ã¼ber die richtigen und falschen Antworten verschaffen.

Vert foncÃ©:
Vous avez sÃ©lectionnÃ© la bonne rÃ©ponse

WÃ¤hrend der Korrektur erhalten Sie auf dieser Seite einen Ãœberblick Ã¼ber die richtigen und falschen Antworten:
